Options.Text: Stand close and watch him read

Dialogs.Text: Waaa! Y-You scared me!
Sorry about that! It’s just… I thought that interrupting you would be kinda rude so… I just… didn’t know how to catch your attention...but I guess just not saying anything was kind of dumb
A-Ah… It’s ok…
Y-yeah, I tend to not notice anything when I’m concentrated, I’m the one who should apologize
It’s ok, I’ve noticed
So… what brings you here? Oh! Did you finish the book?
…What are you doing?
Ah... It’s just… Um... I thought that interrupting you would be kinda rude, you know? So… I just… didn’t know how to catch your attention
So… so you decided to...
to do a… a humming concert?
Yeah
So… what brings you here? Oh! Did you finish the book?
I did! I just finished the book
Really? Wow, that's great!  For a second I thought you really were going to take the whole two weeks
I’ve never understood how people take so long. Whenever I start a book I can’t stop until I’m done, you know?
Haha, yeah, I know, right?
O-of course I wasn't going to take two weeks to read it! I mean, especially with how interesting it was
Really? You liked it? What did you think about it?
Oh, I haven’t yet, sorry. I’ve been pretty busy, you see, and…
I see...guess some people just aren’t into reading very much
I just thought we could talk about it today
You know what? I'll finish it today
Really? You'll really finish it today?
Yeah, I will! And I… I'll come back tomorrow, how does that sound?
Great! Have a nice time reading, then!
Sure, thanks
Well...first of all, you tricked me!
Oh? I don't know what you're talking about
Yes! You did! This book…
... is a romance and mystery!
Well, since you said that you disliked mystery I thought that maybe you just hadn't read the correct one. So maybe I accidentally gave you one you could possibly like
Well, then it worked
It was amazing!
Well, first of all, I was curious…how come you gave me a book with so many illustrations?
Well, you kinda seemed like if I gave you a heavier book you wouldn’t finish it soon...
I-I-I mean! I didn’t know, of course, I didn’t want to judge or anything
But you know, not everyone likes a thousand-page novels
Of course I could handle it! I can read very heavy stuff, you know?
Besides, I’d read any book as good as this one - even if it didn’t have any drawings!
Really? You…you actually liked it?
Yeah! The relationship between the two leads was so engaging! I didn’t expect it to be so sweet...When one of them was revealed to be a murderer I was heartbroken!
Right? I must admit, it also took me off-guard. I don't know why though! The signs were right there from the start! I guess I got too invested in the romance, too
I know! Once I was done, I even started to suspect my own family! I mean…
... what if they’re murderers, too?
Oh, duh!  Why would they invite over to this beautiful island if it wasn’t to kill and eat you?
It was so obvious all along!
Guess I shouldn’t let me imagination run too far, huh?
Oh, well…

I think sometimes books can be so immersing you start to consider them happening in a reality. While that can be true, I think the key to enjoying yourself is remembering it’s fiction. Otherwise, you could start believing everyone around you is a monster in disguise!
Or, well, something like that, you know? If you think stuff like that constantly, well...I think it could get pretty troublesome
You’re right. Wouldn’t want to end up crazy or something, right?
Yeah, exactly
So...what else did you like?
Oh, well, right at the beginning, when they’re in the police station, I noticed that there was…
Forgive me, dear, but how much longer will you take?
Oh god, I'm sorry!
Sorry, Nero! I'll leave you to work, let's talk again soon!
S-Sure!
